long_description: The versatile Petzl Tikka(R) Plus Headlamp pulls together white and red LEDs, a 140-lumen boost mode and constant output throughout the life of the batteries to light up your nighttime adventures. Quality white LED outputs 110 lumens on high, 45 lumens on medium and 30 lumens on low; switch to boost mode for temporary access to 140 lumens to light up the darkest trails. Red LED positioned to the side of the white LED helps preserve your night vision. Use the red and white strobes to signal for help in the mountains or increase your visibility in urban settings. 3 AAA alkaline batteries (included) provide up to 2 hrs. of use on high, 6 hrs. on medium and 12 hrs on low; compatible with rechargeable NiMH and lithium batteries. Constant Lighting technology ensures that the brightness doesn't decrease gradually as the batteries drain. When the batteries are almost drained, the headlamp automatically switches to reserve mode, which provides a minimum of 8 lumens for 40 hrs. Red lighting switches on when the batteries are practically empty to preserve a minimal amount of lighting. Push-button switch is easy to use, even with gloves on. Mixed fabric and elastic headband fits comfortably around your head; headband is washable. Petzl Tikka Plus Headlamp battery case opens easily for changing the batteries. Provides IPX4 water resistance for protection against sprayed water.
short_description: The versatile Petzl Tikka(R) Plus Headlamp pulls together white and red LEDs, a 140-lumen boost mode and constant output throughout the life of the batteries to light up your nighttime adventures.
